thread.title: BRIEF-Herbalife Announces Proposed Offering Of $500 Mln Aggregate Principal Amount Of Convertible Senior Notes

title: BRIEF-Herbalife Announces Proposed Offering Of $500 Mln Aggregate Principal Amount Of Convertible Senior Notes
text: March 20, 2018 / 8:30 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Herbalife Announces Proposed Offering Of $500 Mln Aggregate Principal Amount Of Convertible Senior Notes Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Herbalife Ltd: * HERBALIFE ANNOUNCES PROPOSED OFFERING OF $500 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES * HERBALIFE LTD - ‍INTENDS TO OFFER $500 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES DUE 2024 IN A PRIVATE OFFERING​ * HERBALIFE LTD - ‍EXPECTS TO USE NET PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING TO REPURCHASE A PORTION OF COMPANY’S EXISTING 2.00 PCT CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES DUE 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
